section_title: Extension of period for making Ministerial appointments
section_text: 1   In section 1(1) of the Northern Ireland (Executive Formation etc) Act 2022, for “18 January 2024” substitute  “8 February 2024” .

2    1   This Act extends to England and Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.     2   This Act comes into force on the day on which it is passed.     3   This Act may be cited as the Northern Ireland (Executive Formation) Act 2024.
